name: Alien Prometheus, the Creator
text:
1  or more "Alien" monster(s) + 1 or more Tuner monster(s)
When this card is Special Summoned, place 1 A-Counter on all face-up monsters on your opponent’s side of the field. Once per turn, during either player’s turn (Quick Effect): place 1 A-Counter on a face-up monster on your opponent’s field. Monsters on your opponent’s field with an "A-Counter" have their effects negated. If this card battles a monster with an A-Counter on it, change that monster’s ATK and DEF to 0.
